name: DSTitan
author: Vito Huang

sections.description: DSTitan is a manual dropshipping lister designed to integrate all of your business processes into a single interactive and accessible location. DSTitan enables one-click product import from websites like Aliexpress, Banggood, DHGate and Chinabrands and helps to export products to Ebay. It is a manual lister that can help any dropshipper to improve their productivity. You can read more about the features of DSTitan @ https://dstitan.com
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ds-titan directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the ‘DSTitan’ screen to configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • Release date: June 14, 2019

Initial integration between DSTitan and WooCommerce

short_description: A plugin that will push DSTitan products to WooCommerce store
